title: Phytochemical on-line screening and in silico study of Helianthemum confertum: antioxidant activity, DFT, MD simulation, ADME/T analysis, and xanthine oxidase binding
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22209-22228
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02540G, Paper

Yasmine Chemam, Samir Benayache, Abdeslem Bouzina, Eric Marchioni, Omar Sekiou, Houria Bentoumi, Minjie Zhao, Zihad Bouslama, Nour-Eddine Aouf, Fadila Benayache
Seven components from the methanol extract of the aerial part of the endemic species Helianthemum confertum were isolated and identified for the first time.
